channel.title: I need all infomation on Lineage 2 private servers
channel.description:
my friend is looking for a lineage 2 private server or looking to start his own im requesting all available infomation on the topic
thanks ~Sephiran
cheers!

item.title: I need all infomation on Lineage 2 private servers

item.title: I need all infomation on Lineage 2 private servers
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“Javacisnotrecognized, post:7, topic:34790”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=49987.msg619452#msg619452 date=1166104146]

You really don’t understand how private servers come about, do you?

Explain how to make a private server for a game not Run Escape then.
[/quote]

Simple:

Get the client
take it apart
understand it at a fundamental level
find where it makes the connection
find what causes the graphics to get rendered
create a server that causes the client to render what you want[/quote]

Ok then, make a private server for “A Tale In The Desert”.

Read full topic
item.source: I need all infomation on Lineage 2 private servers

item.title: I need all infomation on Lineage 2 private servers
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:6, topic:34790”][quote author=Javacisnotrecognized link=topic=49987.msg614617#msg614617 date=1166000666]
You really don’t understand how private servers come about, do you?
[/quote]

Explain how to make a private server for a game not Run Escape then.[/quote]

Simple:

Get the client
take it apart
understand it at a fundamental level
find where it makes the connection
find what causes the graphics to get rendered
create a server that causes the client to render what you want

Read full topic
